channel.title: NLP on Vienna R User Group
channel.description: Recent content in NLP on Vienna R User Group

item.title: Meetup 07-2019 Minutes
item.description: R in corporate enivroments (finance depts.) Walter Djuric Walter did a short presentation, on the potential and real life uses of R (and RStudio) in a typical business (ie Accounting) departmentn in a large Austrian financial institution. He discussed common pitfalls (mostly linked to infrastructure problems eg firewalls, non-admin user-rights, AV software, etc) and what tactics can be applied to cope with these challenges (eg a local CRAN, package building for the team, enhanced .
